name: Grilled Asparagus (No Cholesterol)
instructions: Wash asparagus; snap off the woody ends. Brush well with olive oil. Sprinkle with garlic and rosemary. Move the spears to distribute the herbs evenly. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Let asparagus marinate for 10 to 15 minutes. Place spears over a charcoal or gas grill fire. Let cook about 3 minutes. Turn asparagus. Cook for and equal length of time. Remove from fire. The recipe serves four, unless you really like asparagus. Then it serves two. Approximate nutrition information per serving: 57 calories; 3.5g fat (50 percent calories from fat); no cholesterol; 3g protein; 5g carbo- hydrate; 2.5g fiber; 2 mg sodium.
